thread.section_title: Paddy Power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paddy Power | www.paddypower.com
thread.title: DFlan

author: DFlan
title: DFlan
text:
I took advantage of the Â£30 free bet promo code, I win some money and decide to withdraw my original deposit but Paddypower lock my account for no reason and want ALL personal identification with a photo of me holding them like a 419 scam with customer service just repeating "This was a decision taken by the security team" over and over. Until they disconnected. (can't add the screenshot after)
Can't dispute these with Paypal either.
